TITLE: Here's what tax pros recommend after the IRS halts processing for small business tax credit
SUMMARY: As the IRS pauses on processing new employee retention tax credit claims, some filers are in limbo as the agency works on further guidance. Here's what to know.

SUMMARY: The IRS will immediately stop processing new claims for the employee retention credit to protect filers from a "surge of questionable claims."

TITLE: The disaster era business loans that are becoming key to Main Street's survival
SUMMARY: Hawaii wildfires and Hurricane Idalia underscore the costly effects of natural disasters on small business. Knowing the emergency funding options is critical.

TITLE: Small business confidence is tanking again, especially in banks and Biden
SUMMARY: Main Street confidence is back at an all-time low, with notable sentiment drops related to President Biden and big banks, according to CNBC, SurveyMonkey data.

TITLE: Lawmakers weigh tax rule 'backslide' for Venmo, PayPal users, says analyst. What it means for you
SUMMARY: Some lawmakers want to increase the tax-reporting thresholds for Form 1099-K, which covers payments from companies such as Venmo or PayPal. Here's what to know.

TITLE: How gas station economics will change in the electric vehicle charging future
SUMMARY: Gas stations will face big decisions related to costs and opportunities as gasoline-powered cars are replaced by EVs.

SUMMARY: Small business owners say social media giants including Meta aren't doing enough to prevent them from becoming hacking victims.

SUMMARY: National labor data shows that only one in five disabled Americans can find work, but Amy and Ben Wright, Bitty & Beau's Coffee founders, are changing that.

TITLE: Four-time Olympic medalist Dominique Dawes on how she defines success
SUMMARY: Olympic icon Dominique Dawes wants more than sports records for the kids attending her gymnastics academies. She wants to build champion human beings.

TITLE: 'Something bad is happening around the corner': Why a consumer spending drop is likely in the fall
SUMMARY: Consumers have continued to spend amid high inflation, but interest rate hikes and resuming student loan payments could slow that.

TITLE: Harvard Business School A.I. guru on why every Main Street shop should start using ChatGPT
SUMMARY: The biggest tech companies are betting it all on generative artificial intelligence. Every small business should do the same, says Harvard Business School guru.

SUMMARY: Scrutiny of a pandemic-era tax credit intensified this week for the employee retention tax credit. Here's what it means for small businesses.

SUMMARY: Main Street businesses like florists, coffee shops, hair salons and gas stations can earn up to $27,000 in extra income through a new Amazon delivery model.

TITLE: Small businesses may have a hard time finding teen workers this summer
SUMMARY: The unemployment rate for teens aged 16 to 19 crept up slightly in June, while the labor participation rate fell year on year.

SUMMARY: The FTC is considering changes to franchising rules that would affect companies from McDonald's to Yum Brands and Marriott.

TITLE: LGBTQ small business owners struggle to find financing
SUMMARY: LGBTQ-owned businesses reported more rejections than non-LGBTQ businesses that applied for funding, according to a 2022 report.

SUMMARY: Small business owners are concerned about hiring this summer, as factors including inflation, child care and housing make for a difficult market.

SUMMARY: Amazon announced that Prime Day will take place July 11-July 12. From flash sales to coupons and promotional codes, these are the deals to expect from sellers.

SUMMARY: The IRS is weighing guidance for small businesses that wrongly claimed the employee retention tax credit. Here's what entrepreneurs need to know.

SUMMARY: The employee retention tax credit was created for businesses affected by the Covid-19 pandemic. Here's what to know before amending tax returns to claim it.

TITLE: Amazon Prime Day is coming. Here's how sellers can prepare to boost their sales
SUMMARY: Amazon Prime Day hit record sales last year, and this year's event is likely to be in July. For third-party sellers on the e-commerce platform, it's a big deal.

SUMMARY: The Employee Retention Credit has soared in popularity among pandemic-related tax incentives for business owners, but the IRS has become skeptical of claims.

SUMMARY: As GM and Ford push the EV transition, local dealership owners are a key to selling the shift to car buyers.

SUMMARY: Online loans and merchant cash advance offers will come for business owners as banks tighten credit access, but there are big risks with these funding options.

SUMMARY: As debt ceiling talks continue and default looms for the U.S. government, Main Street business owners are worried about the economic damage.

TITLE: There may never be a better time to create a retirement plan
SUMMARY: With recent passage of the Secure 2.0 legislation, many small businesses should consider starting a retirement plan. The tax savings can be big, costs are down.

TITLE: Shopify's president on why he prefers paying micro-influencers to grow his own side hustle
SUMMARY: Shopify president Harley Finkelstein says micro-influencers on Discord, Reddit, Pinterest can be wiser marketing than Instagram, TikTok personalities.

SUMMARY: Portland Trail Blazer Damian Lillard co-founded sneaker insole company Move after seeing the impact that good foot health could have on his NBA playing career.

TITLE: How to keep your business deposit cash safe during a banking crisis
SUMMARY: The regional banking crisis has led many business owners to rethink account relationships and risks, but making too many changes can be costly and unnecessary.

TITLE: Small business confidence rises slightly, but inflation, economic concerns dim outlook
SUMMARY: Main Street confidence ticks up in latest CNBC quarterly small business survey, but inflation remains a big concern and the overall view of the economy is weak.
